languages.text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to use. The character removes the blinded, immobilised, prone, slowed, staggered, and stunned effects from themselves. This ability can be used even while stunned or prone. If the character has no negative effects to remove, they instead gain +1 AP and +4 MP on the current turn. This ability can only be used once per combat and cannot be used during the first round.

traits.locale_text:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs {uip|WoundCost|8b7bcaa093224422ac66c80ffcf69f6d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to use.
Character removes all Stun, Prone, Blindness, Slowed, Immobilized, Staggered effects from themselves. This ability can be used even if the Reaper cannot otherwise act (while stunned or prone, for example).
If the character has no negative effects that can be removed, they instead gain 1 action point and 4 movement points. This ability can only be used once per combat, and cannot be used during the first turn.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs {uip|WoundCost|8b7bcaa093224422ac66c80ffcf69f6d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to use. The character removes the blinded, immobilised, prone, slowed, staggered, and stunned effects from themselves. This ability can even be used while stunned or knocked prone. If the character has no negative effects to remove, they instead gain +1 AP and +4 MP in the current turn. This ability can only be used once per combat and cannot be used during the first round.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs {uip|WoundCost|8b7bcaa093224422ac66c80ffcf69f6d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to use. The character removes the blinded, immobilised, prone, slowed, staggered, and stunned effects from themselves. This ability can even be used while stunned or knocked prone. If the character has no negative effects to remove, they instead gain +1 AP and +4 MP in the current turn. This ability can only be used once per combat and cannot be used during the first round.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs {uip|WoundCost|8b7bcaa093224422ac66c80ffcf69f6d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to use. The character removes the blinded, immobilised, prone, slowed, staggered, and stunned effects from themselves. This ability can be used even while stunned or prone. If the character has no negative effects to remove, they instead gain +1 AP and +4 MP on the current turn. This ability can only be used once per combat and cannot be used during the first round.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to use. The character removes the blinded, immobilised, prone, slowed, staggered, and stunned effects from themselves. This ability can be used even while stunned or prone. If the character has no negative effects to remove, they instead gain +1 AP and +4 MP on the current turn. This ability can only be used once per combat and cannot be used during the first round.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to use. The character removes the blinded, immobilised, prone, slowed, staggered, and stunned effects from themselves. This ability can be used even while stunned or prone. If the character has no negative effects to remove, they instead gain +1 AP and +4 MP on the current turn. This ability can only be used once per combat and cannot be used during the first round.

languages.text: Чтобы применить эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, нужно потратить {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Персонаж снимает с себя ослепление, обездвиживание, опрокидывание, замедление, ошеломление и оглушение. Можно использовать даже при оглушении и опрокидывании. Если на персонажа не действуют перечисленные негативные эффекты, при применении этой способности он получает +1 ОД и +4 ОП в текущем ходу. Эту способность можно применять только один раз за бой и не раньше второго раунда.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to use. The character removes the blinded, immobilised, prone, slowed, staggered, and stunned effects from themselves. This ability can be used even while stunned or prone. If the character has no negative effects to remove, they instead gain +1 AP and +4 MP on the current turn. This ability can only be used once per combat and cannot be used during the first round.

traits.locale_text: Чтобы применить эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, нужно потратить {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Персонаж снимает с себя ослепление, обездвиживание, опрокидывание, замедление, ошеломление и оглушение. Можно использовать даже при оглушении и опрокидывании. Если на персонажа не действуют перечисленные негативные эффекты, при применении этой способности он получает +1 ОД и +4 ОП в текущем ходу. Эту способность можно применять только один раз за бой и не раньше второго раунда.

Чтобы применить эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, нужно потратить {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Персонаж снимает с себя ослепление, обездвиживание, опрокидывание, замедление, ошеломление и оглушение. Можно использовать даже при оглушении и опрокидывании. Если на персонажа не действуют перечисленные негативные эффекты, при применении этой способности он получает +1 ОД и +4 ОП в текущем ходу. Эту способность можно применять только один раз за бой и не раньше второго раунда.

languages.text: Usar esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} consume {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. El personaje elimina los efectos de ceguera, inmovilizado, derribado, ralentizado, desequilibrado y aturdido que sufra. Esta capacidad puede utilizarse incluso aunque el personaje esté aturdido o derribado. Si el personaje no tiene ningún efecto negativo que eliminar, en vez de eso gana +1 PA y +4 PM en su turno actual. Esta capacidad solo se puede usar una vez por combate y no puede utilizarse en el primer asalto del mismo.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to use. The character removes the blinded, immobilised, prone, slowed, staggered, and stunned effects from themselves. This ability can be used even while stunned or prone. If the character has no negative effects to remove, they instead gain +1 AP and +4 MP on the current turn. This ability can only be used once per combat and cannot be used during the first round.

traits.locale_text: Usar esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} consume {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. El personaje elimina los efectos de ceguera, inmovilizado, derribado, ralentizado, desequilibrado y aturdido que sufra. Esta capacidad puede utilizarse incluso aunque el personaje esté aturdido o derribado. Si el personaje no tiene ningún efecto negativo que eliminar, en vez de eso gana +1 PA y +4 PM en su turno actual. Esta capacidad solo se puede usar una vez por combate y no puede utilizarse en el primer asalto del mismo.

languages.text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}を使用するには{uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109}{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷を{/g}要する。そのキャラクターは自分自身から目潰し、不動、移動不可、スピード落とし、よろけ、気絶の効果を取り除く。この能力は気絶状態や伏せ状態でも使用できる。そのキャラクターに取り除くべきネガティブ効果がない場合、代わりにそのターンにAP+1とMP+4を得る。この能力は戦闘ごとに1度のみ使用でき、最初のラウンドには使用できない。
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to use. The character removes the blinded, immobilised, prone, slowed, staggered, and stunned effects from themselves. This ability can be used even while stunned or prone. If the character has no negative effects to remove, they instead gain +1 AP and +4 MP on the current turn. This ability can only be used once per combat and cannot be used during the first round.

traits.locale_text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}を使用するには{uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109}{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷を{/g}要する。そのキャラクターは自分自身から目潰し、不動、移動不可、スピード落とし、よろけ、気絶の効果を取り除く。この能力は気絶状態や伏せ状態でも使用できる。そのキャラクターに取り除くべきネガティブ効果がない場合、代わりにそのターンにAP+1とMP+4を得る。この能力は戦闘ごとに1度のみ使用でき、最初のラウンドには使用できない。

languages.text: 使用此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}会耗费{uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。该角色立刻移除自身致盲、定身、倒地、减速、恐慌、眩晕效果，此能力可在眩晕或倒地状态下使用。如果角色没有需要移除的负面效果，则会在当前回合内获得1点行动点数与4点移动点数。此能力每场战斗只能使用一次，且无法在第一轮中使用。
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to use. The character removes the blinded, immobilised, prone, slowed, staggered, and stunned effects from themselves. This ability can be used even while stunned or prone. If the character has no negative effects to remove, they instead gain +1 AP and +4 MP on the current turn. This ability can only be used once per combat and cannot be used during the first round.

traits.locale_text: 使用此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}会耗费{uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。该角色立刻移除自身致盲、定身、倒地、减速、恐慌、眩晕效果，此能力可在眩晕或倒地状态下使用。如果角色没有需要移除的负面效果，则会在当前回合内获得1点行动点数与4点移动点数。此能力每场战斗只能使用一次，且无法在第一轮中使用。

languages.text: Der Einsatz dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kostet {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}. Der Charakter befreit sich von folgenden Effekten: geblendet, gelähmt, niedergestreckt, verlangsamt, taumelnd und betäubt. Diese Fähigkeit kann auch eingesetzt werden, wenn der Charakter betäubt oder niedergestreckt ist. Ist der Charakter nicht mit negativen Effekten belegt, erhält er stattdessen für seinen aktuellen Zug +1 AP und +4 BP. Diese Fähigkeit kann nur einmal pro Kampf, nicht aber in der ersten Runde eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to use. The character removes the blinded, immobilised, prone, slowed, staggered, and stunned effects from themselves. This ability can be used even while stunned or prone. If the character has no negative effects to remove, they instead gain +1 AP and +4 MP on the current turn. This ability can only be used once per combat and cannot be used during the first round.

traits.locale_text: Der Einsatz dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kostet {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}. Der Charakter befreit sich von folgenden Effekten: geblendet, gelähmt, niedergestreckt, verlangsamt, taumelnd und betäubt. Diese Fähigkeit kann auch eingesetzt werden, wenn der Charakter betäubt oder niedergestreckt ist. Ist der Charakter nicht mit negativen Effekten belegt, erhält er stattdessen für seinen aktuellen Zug +1 AP und +4 BP. Diese Fähigkeit kann nur einmal pro Kampf, nicht aber in der ersten Runde eingesetzt werden.

languages.text: L'utilisation de cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} coûte {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Le personnage dissipe les effets suivants qui l'affectent : Aveuglement, Immobilisation, Paralysie, Ralentissement, Sidération et Étourdissement. Cette capacité peut être utilisée même sous l'effet Étourdissement ou Paralysie. Si le personnage ne souffre d'aucun effet négatif, il gagne à la place +1 PA et +4 PD pour le tour en cours. Utilisable une fois par combat. Ne peut pas être utilisé lors du premier round.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to use. The character removes the blinded, immobilised, prone, slowed, staggered, and stunned effects from themselves. This ability can be used even while stunned or prone. If the character has no negative effects to remove, they instead gain +1 AP and +4 MP on the current turn. This ability can only be used once per combat and cannot be used during the first round.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisation de cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} coûte {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Le personnage dissipe les effets suivants qui l'affectent : Aveuglement, Immobilisation, Paralysie, Ralentissement, Sidération et Étourdissement. Cette capacité peut être utilisée même sous l'effet Étourdissement et Paralysie. Si le personnage ne souffre d'aucun effet négatif, il gagne à la place +1 PA et +4 PD pour le tour en cours. Utilisable une fois par combat. Ne peut pas être utilisé lors du premier round.

L'utilisation de cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} coûte {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Le personnage dissipe les effets suivants qui l'affectent : Aveuglement, Immobilisation, Paralysie, Ralentissement, Sidération et Étourdissement. Cette capacité peut être utilisée même sous l'effet Étourdissement et Paralysie. Si le personnage ne souffre d'aucun effet négatif, il gagne à la place +1 PA et +4 PD pour le tour en cours. Utilisable une fois par combat. Ne peut pas être utilisé lors du premier round.

languages.text: Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kullanmak için {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı harcanır. Karakter; üzerindeki körleşme, felç, yere devrilme, yavaşlama, afallama ve sersemlik etkilerini ortadan kaldırır. Bu kabiliyet, sersemlik veya yere devrilme hâllerinde de kullanılabilir. Karakterde ortadan kaldıracak olumsuz bir etki yoksa bunun yerine mevcut turu için +1 EP ve +4 HP kazanır. Bu kabiliyet, her çatışmada sadece bir kez kullanılabilir ve ilk rauntta kullanılamaz.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs {uip|WoundCost|a84ce6cbf09447b3970f7b4df0b7f109} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to use. The character removes the blinded, immobilised, prone, slowed, staggered, and stunned effects from themselves. This ability can be used even while stunned or prone. If the character has no negative effects to remove, they instead gain +1 AP and +4 MP on the current turn. This ability can only be used once per combat and cannot be used during the first round.
